rooms.name: Queen Serene
rooms.description: Our Queen Serene double room offers ultimate comfort with air conditioning, soundproof walls, and a private bathroom featuring a shower and hairdryer. The room is also equipped with a flat-screen TV, perfect for relaxation. Designed for a restful stay, it includes one cozy bed to ensure your complete comfort.

rooms.name: Drama Queen
rooms.description: The Drama Queen double room is equipped with air conditioning and a private bathroom featuring a shower and hairdryer. For your convenience, the room also offers a flat-screen TV. The unit includes one comfortable bed.

rooms.name: Booster Twin Room
rooms.description: The Booster Twin room offers air conditioning and soundproof walls, along with a private bathroom featuring a shower and a hairdryer. For added comfort, the room spans 25 mÂ² and includes a flat-screen TV. The unit offers two separate beds, making it ideal for friends or colleagues traveling together.

rooms.name: Playful Twin Room
rooms.description: The Playful Twin room offers air conditioning and soundproof walls, along with a private bathroom featuring a shower and a hairdryer. For added comfort, the room includes a flat-screen TV. The unit offers two separate beds, making it an ideal choice for friends or colleagues traveling together.

rooms.name: Moxy Sweet
rooms.description: The Moxy Sweet suite offers a perfect blend of comfort and style. This air-conditioned suite features one bedroom and a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. The suite includes one extra-large double bed and one sofa bed. It also offers a seating area with a flat-screen TV and soundproof walls for a peaceful stay, ensuring a comfortable and enjoyable experience.
